about_the_game:
Food Icon Set is an RPG Maker official collection of icons made in pixel art.
With "Food Icon Set", you have access to 50 high-quality pixel art food sprites inspired by dishes from all over the world. They are most suitable as icons for menus, but can be used as item drops or whatever you desire to use them for.

■Highly detailed and vibrant food sprites hand-drawn in pixel art from the size of 16x16px then upscaled pixel-perfect to 32x32px to give the feel of classic pixel art video games.

■Includes an assortment of sandwiches, meats, fruits, pastas, ramen, sushi, pastries, desserts, and others!

■Use as icons for menus, item drops from enemies, props for scenes, or whatever you can think of!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【Icon Set (1 Sheet)】

Includes:
1.) food-icons.png
2.) IconSet.png
3.) “individual-sprites” folder containing the 50 food icons in their individual images.

【TileSet (1 sheet)】
item-drop-food_E.png
